    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void checkValidity(android.view.View view)
      the funtion will check if the word is valid or not by using an object of DictionaryRequest class
      void decrementLife()
      this function will decrement a life if the player fails to choose a valid word also it will decrement the images of heart
      void deleteMadeWord(android.view.View view)
      if a player accidently press any wrong character, by pressing the DELETE button s(he) can delete the character
      void gotoMainMenu(android.view.View view)
      if the player wants to go to the main menu while the game is running and presses the MAIN MENU button the values of the current game will be saved and main menu will be opened
      void gridGenerator(int totalLevelCount)
      this function generates the grid of random letters, there will be random grids for each level
      void highlight(android.view.View view)
      if the SUGGESTION button is pressed, it will highlight the boxes by which a valid word can be made and a life will be decremented
      void levelChange()
      once a level is finished, the level will be incremented and the text will be updated also the countdown will be started and new grid will be generated
      void onBackPressed()
      if the player press the back button of phone while the game is running, a pop up window will be opened
      void postCheckAction() 
      void resumeGame(android.view.View view)
      if the player clicks the RESUME button, the game will start at its previous state
      void showFailurePopUp()
      if the player fails to find any valid word, it will show a pop up window for 3 seconds
      void showPauseWindow()
      if the player press the back button when the game is running, a pop up window will be opened and the timer will be paused
      void showSuccessPopUp(java.lang.String str)
      if the player succeeds to find a valid word within the given time, he/she will gain the score same as the length of the word and a pop up window will be opened containing the definition of that word
      void storeScore()
      this function will store the score in database
      void successLevelChange(android.view.View view)
      shuts down the pop up window showing the definition of the word
